text:
Has anyone had issues with Gmail clipping emails due to the image upscaling native to HubSpot? This upscaling is also causing our images to be blurry.  (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/can-i-disable-automatic-image-resizing>)
Is there a way to attach the ?noresize when using the image module?

Hey Theresa, I'm not too familiar with the drag and drop editor,  but there is a way around the resizing issue. If you copy the file source from the file manager, you can then use the "add image from URL" option at the bottom of the image selector and then add the ?noresize param to the end of the image address
ah yes! thank you that will work in a pinch :smile:
